body_html:
I am fairly confident that #11985 should eliminate all the hangs (unless you interrupt at unfortunate times which we can't control). Now that it is merged, I am closing this.

The hang with cv2 is also out of our control as cv2 just doesn't play nicely with multiprocessing.

body:
I am fairly confident that #11985 should eliminate all the hangs (unless you interrupt at unfortunate times which we can't control). Now that it is merged, I am closing this. 

The hang with cv2 is also out of our control as cv2 just doesn't play nicely with multiprocessing.
